1389004117947953159.name: Mark Cuban
1389004117947953159.content: Crypto  not just about being more productive and effective, but also no longer dependent on "trusted institutions" Ask PPP applicants how much they trust their big banks? Do you trust your  health insurer?. Crypto is trustless and a better way to handle many transactions.

1389004112654655489.name: Mark Cuban
1389004112654655489.content: Crypto succeeds when it's a more productive implementation of it's competition. BTC/Gold are both financial religions. BTC is easy to trade/store/create with no delivery issues. BTC also enables transfer of value locally and globally . Gold is a hassle. Just look at Ft Knox
